reviews.review_msg: Prof Doyon was tough but I really enjoyed her content. I learnt a heck of a lot and would 100% recommend her as a prof. Biggest tip is to email her if you have any questions.

Bummed out cuz the class sounded so interesting and I had high hopes, but the prof marks way too hard with unclear guidelines so this class was not as fun as I thought it would be. Has very high expectations even though she doesn't provide detailed criteria. Super bummed out.

Extremely difficult to know what she wants from you in order to receive marks. Overall, a nice person, but a terrible prof that has personal biases in all aspects of her teaching. The lecture recordings are incredibly hard to follow at times so it's best to just read the assigned material. If you can avoid her, do yourself a favour and do so.
